topNav.message: What can we help you with today?

banner.title: Welcome to EE's new Digital service
banner.body: Let's get you started!                                                            Please select an option from below. You can use the arrows to navigate or the home icon to return to the start.

banner.title: How do you pay?
banner.body: If you pay by direct debit or at the end of each month choose pay monthly. If you top up it's pay as you go.

banner.title: Information about your delivery
banner.body: You'll receive a text message from our DPD courier the day before delivery which confirms your delivery date, gives you options to change your delivery time and provides a website link you can use to track or change your order on the DPD  website. On the day of delivery you'll receive a further text message containing a 1 hour  window your parcel will be delivered within along with the same website link to track or change your delivery.  If that's it for now please return to Home.

input.message: Please type a short summary of your query and one of our dedicated team will then call you back within the next 15 minutes to help

banner.title: You've still got an amount left on your device loan.
banner.body: It'll need to be paid before you can upgrade.

banner.title: You've still got an amount left on your device loan.
banner.body: It'll need to be paid before you can cancel your contract.

banner.title: Great news, you're eligible for an upgrade!
banner.body: Please select an option below.

banner.title: Great news, you can upgrade early and get the latest handset today!
banner.body: You can also reduce any fees involved with your upgrade by trading in your old phone (subject to eligibility rules). Please select an option below.

banner.title: Great news, you can upgrade early and get the latest handset today! You can reduce the fee by giving us your old handset.
banner.body: Please select an option from below.

banner.title: Great news, you can trade your current phone for a new one.
banner.body: Please select an option below.

banner.title: We can see you recently asked to leave us.
banner.body: If you've changed your mind and would like to stay, please click below to talk to our team.

banner.title: You currently aren't eligible to upgrade.
banner.body: Please select an option below.

banner.title: Contact an EE Guide
banner.body: Speak with one of our EE Guides by selecting a contact option. Get in touch and we'll reply as soon as we can

banner.title: Contact an EE Guide
banner.body: Speak with one of our EE Guides by selecting a contact option. Get in touch and we'll reply as soon as we can

banner.title: Contact an EE Guide
banner.body: Speak with one of our EE Guides by selecting a contact option. Get in touch and we'll reply as soon as we can

banner.title: You can now book an appointment at one of your local stores.
banner.body: It's quicker and easier to get your phone fixed with one of our gurus in store. They can help diagnose any issues, organise a repair and give your device a MOT. Tap below to book an appointment.

input.message: Please type a short summary of your query, including any error messages you see. One of our dedicated team will then call you back within the next 15 minutes to help

banner.title: Password Reset Support
banner.body: If you need to reset any passwords please tap on the buttons below to go straight to the reset page.

input.message: Please type a short summary of your query, including any error messages you see. One of our dedicated team will then call you back within the next 15 minutes to help
